attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to make sure every local council holds weekly household refuse collections!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of the Moray Council refusing to uplift from the kerbside any more than one bin per household regardless if that household has previously purchased extra bins from said council. 
"I bought a second bin and now I am being told you took my money but you are not going to be picking it up" Gordon McDonald (Councillor) ref: The Northern Scot Newspaper Friday 11 December 2009
There is obviously a need for a weekly collection as many households are struggling with fortnightly collections.
